name: Totally Accurate Cowboy Simulator
description: Created as the final assessment from the 2019-T3 GDS210  class at SAE Perth along with Laurence Valentini, William Roberts, Ken Taylor, Joshua Ganon, Isaac Gransden, John Valdez and Blake Shortland. This is a VR game, with 3 minigame components connected by a saloon hubworld. Play the drink serving (my main contribution), the 6-shooter and the knife/axe throwing minigame in a cartoonish VR experience. all assets were made by the students, with the final project taking around 5 weeks to complete.
